Rule.Name: f2013MSI
Rule.Query: $n4DigitSKUVersion='2013' and $.='MSI'

Rule.Name: n3510688CrashMsoucExe107480972695
Rule.Query: count(../Instance[Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Name' and (lower-case(Value)='mso.dll')] and Setting[@Key1='Fault offset' and (lower-case(Value)='01392410')]])

Rule.Name: n3510688CrashMsoucExe107599155764
Rule.Query: count(../Instance[Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Name' and (lower-case(Value)='mso.dll')] and Setting[@Key1='Fault offset' and (lower-case(Value)='0139ca00')]])

Rule.Name: n3510688CrashMsoucExe107460718293
Rule.Query: count(../Instance[Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Name' and (lower-case(Value)='mso.dll')] and Setting[@Key1='Fault offset' and (lower-case(Value)='013959c8')]])

Rule.Name: n3510688CrashMsoucExe107553866718
Rule.Query: count(../Instance[Setting[@Key1='Faulting Module Name' and (lower-case(Value)='mso.dll')] and Setting[@Key1='Fault offset' and (lower-case(Value)='013914c0')]])

Rule.Name: sMsoucExeCrash3510688MSI
Rule.Query: $nInstallType='MSI' and $n2DigitVersion=15 and versioncompare($MSO_sMso2013Version,'15.0.4763.1000')<0 and ($n3510688CrashMsoucExe107480972695>0 or $n3510688CrashMsoucExe107599155764>0 or $n3510688CrashMsoucExe107460718293>0 or $n3510688CrashMsoucExe107553866718>0)
Rule.Title: Known crashing issue (with a fix) was detected
Rule.Text:
A crashing issue that was fixed in the October 13, 2015 update for Office 2013 (Mso.dll) has been detected {0} time(s).
Please click the 'Click here ...' link for details on the issue. Or, click the 'Download the update ...' link to access the very latest update for Mso.dll.

Rule.Name: sMsoucExeCrash3510688C2R
Rule.Query: $nInstallType='ClickToRun' and $n2DigitVersion=15 and versioncompare($MSO_sMso2013Version,'15.0.4763.1000')<0 and ($n3510688CrashMsoucExe107480972695>0 or $n3510688CrashMsoucExe107599155764>0 or $n3510688CrashMsoucExe107460718293>0 or $n3510688CrashMsoucExe107553866718>0)
Rule.Title: Known crashing issue (with a fix) was detected
Rule.Text:
A crashing issue that is fixed in the October 13, 2015 update for Office 2013 (Mso.dll) has been detected {0} time(s).
To resolve this problem, click the 'Click here ...' link and then update Office using the steps in the 'Get the latest version of Office' section of the article.
